ProcessTemplates.Name: JSON file to CSV file
ProcessTemplates.Description: This Process will read the contents of a JSON file from an SFTP server. It will convert the JSON into CSV format and then write the converted data back to the SFTP server.
ProcessTemplates.ProcessVariablesJson: {"InFilePath":{"Value":"\"/data.json\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":""},"OutFilePath":{"Value":"\"/data.csv\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"Output CSV file path on the SFTP server."},"ServerAddress":{"Value":"\"127.0.0.1\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":""},"ServerUser":{"Value":"\"user\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":""},"ServerPassword":{"Value":"\"password\"","IsSecret":true,"Mode":"text","Description":""}}
